item.title: 报告解读（2）：COST TU1402 Quantifying the Value of SHM
item.description:
报告简介

  • The Guides for Operators, Scientists and Practicing Engineers on Quantifying the Value of Structural Health Information (SHI) for Decision Support have emerged from the scientific networking project COST Action TU1402 (www.cost-tu1402.eu) in the period from 2014 to 2019. The guides are the result of the TU1402 Working Group 5 on Standardisation in conjunction with the work of the Joint Committee on Structural Safety (JCSS – www.jcss.co).

  • 该项目有三份报告，分别是GUIDE for operators, GUIDE for practicing Engineers以及GUIDE for sicientists，三份报告在数学层面上以此递增。
